title: The Godfather
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

title: Cabaret
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Music, Scoring Original Song Score and/or Adaptation
description: A female nightclub entertainer in 1931 Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

title: Deliverance
description: Intentional killing of people or animals, whichever comes first, in a river infested with those who have a penchant for squealing.

title: Last Tango in Paris
description: A young Parisian woman begins a sordid affair with a middle-aged American businessman who demands their relationship be based only on sex.

title: The Poseidon Adventure
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Visual Effects
description: A group of passengers must climb to the top of an overturned luxury liner in order to survive.

title: Aguirre, the Wrath of God
description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

title: Solaris
description: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
description: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around a group of upper-class friends who are unable to have a meal together.

title: Sleuth
description: A wealthy mystery writer and his wife's lover play a deadly game of cat and mouse.

title: Frenzy
description: A serial killer known as the "Necktie Murderer" is terrorizing London, and an innocent man is framed for the crimes.

title: What's Up, Doc?
description: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

title: The Getaway
description: A recently released convict goes on the run with his wife after a botched bank robbery.

title: Lady Sings the Blues
description: The story of the troubled life and career of legendary jazz singer Billie Holiday.

title: Cries and Whispers
description: When a woman is dying of cancer, her two sisters come to be with her in her final days, and the emotional distance between them is painfully evident.

title: Fat City
description: A down-on-his-luck boxer and a promising young fighter's lives intersect in this gritty look at the world of small-time boxing.

title: Jeremiah Johnson
description: A Mexican-American War veteran heads to the mountains to live in isolation, but he finds that he cannot escape the violence of the world.

title: Pink Flamingos
description: Two families compete for the title of 'the filthiest people alive' in this cult classic of bad taste.

title: Sounder
description: The story of a black sharecropper family in the 1930s South and their struggles with poverty and racism.

title: The Way of the Dragon
description: A man arrives in Rome from Hong Kong to help his relatives who are being pressured by local gangsters to sell their restaurant.

title: Fist of Fury
description: A young martial artist seeks revenge for the death of his teacher.

title: The Candidate
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay Based on Factual Material or Material Not Previously Published or Produced
description: An idealistic lawyer is persuaded to run for the U.S. Senate, but he must compromise his principles to win.

title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask
description: A series of seven vignettes that spoof the best-selling sex manual.

title: Fellini's Roma
description: A series of surreal and impressionistic vignettes about the city of Rome.

title: Travels with My Aunt
description: A staid London bank clerk is drawn into a world of adventure and intrigue by his eccentric, globetrotting aunt.

title: The Ruling Class
description: A paranoid schizophrenic inherits a peerage and a seat in the House of Lords.

title: Super Fly
description: A cocaine dealer in Harlem tries to score one last big deal before he gets out of the business.

title: Chloe in the Afternoon
description: A happily married man fantasizes about other women, and his fantasies are put to the test when an old flame reappears in his life.

title: The Heartbreak Kid
description: A newlywed man on his honeymoon falls in love with another woman and decides to leave his wife.

title: Silent Running
description: In a future where all flora is extinct on Earth, an astronaut is given orders to destroy the last of Earth's botany, kept in a greenhouse on board a spacecraft.

title: Images
description: A children's author is haunted by disturbing visions and begins to lose her grip on reality.

title: Across 110th Street
description: Two New York City detectives are on the hunt for a group of criminals who stole a large sum of money from the Mafia.

title: Blacula
description: An 18th-century African prince is turned into a vampire by Dracula and awakens in 1970s Los Angeles.

title: Frogs
description: A group of people on a remote island are terrorized by an army of frogs and other reptiles.

title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
description: In a futuristic world where apes are enslaved by humans, the son of the talking chimpanzees from the past leads a rebellion.

title: What's Up, Tiger Lily?
description: Woody Allen takes a Japanese spy film and dubs it with his own comic dialogue.

title: Prime Cut
description: A mob enforcer is sent to Kansas City to collect a debt from a cattle rancher who has been selling his men as hamburger meat.

title: The New Land
description: The continuing story of a Swedish immigrant family's struggles to build a new life in America.

title: State of Siege
description: The story of an American official who is kidnapped by a group of urban guerrillas in Uruguay.

title: Ulzana's Raid
description: A U.S. Cavalry troop is sent to track down a band of renegade Apaches.

title: The Valachi Papers
description: The true story of Joseph Valachi, a low-level mobster who became a government witness and exposed the inner workings of the Mafia.
